nodes.text: The Bobog was a gigantic being who lived on the Forest Moon of Endor. In 3 ABY, the young Ewoks Wicket Wystri Warrick, Teebo, Kneesaa a Jari Kintaka, and Latara went to the Bobog to trade.
The Bobog first appeared in "Hard Sell," the eleventh episode of the animated television series Ewoks. The episode was written by Michael Reaves and premiered on October 25, 1986.
